channel.title: Can somebody please help me add a layout to my site?
channel.description: I have a website layout but it has a lot of files in it it has a .psd and then some other files like imgs and css stuff how would i upload the layout to my site ive looked at a lot of youtube vids and dont quite undertand please i have teamviewer and skype if needed

item.title: Can somebody please help me add a layout to my site?
item.dc:creator: @classic mopmans little slave
item.description:
@classic wrote:

[quote=“t4, post:4, topic:431211”]don’t pm me, i won’t answer.

usually, a HTML w/ CSS webpage has individual HTML files that are the pages and a common CSS file which is referenced by all pages (CSS is a stylesheet - it provides a skeleton for the page). so by knowing this, you’d upload your css sheet to the root directory of the webserver (/home/host2783/public_html) and each page in its correct directory (index should obviously be in /home/host2783/public_html too). the directory structure you’re seeing will be the same structure visitors see.[/quote]
stop talking to him, he’s a fucking idiot

Read full topic
item.source: Can somebody please help me add a layout to my site?

item.title: Can somebody please help me add a layout to my site?
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

don’t pm me, i won’t answer.

usually, a HTML w/ CSS webpage has individual HTML files that are the pages and a common CSS file which is referenced by all pages (CSS is a stylesheet - it provides a skeleton for the page). so by knowing this, you’d upload your css sheet to the root directory of the webserver (/home/host2783/public_html) and each page in its correct directory (index should obviously be in /home/host2783/public_html too). the directory structure you’re seeing will be the same structure visitors see.

Read full topic
item.source: Can somebody please help me add a layout to my site?

item.title: Can somebody please help me add a layout to my site?
item.dc:creator: @eDIT1 -eDIT-
item.description:
@eDIT1 wrote:

t4:

usually your host provides you with ssh or ftp access (often through a control panel, else you can use software like filezilla).

it gives me an option in the control panel; to but i dont get what i need to add like what files or advanced css… this is confusing me

Read full topic
